name: Chromium
educationalNotes: Chromium makes steel shiny and resistant to rust - chromium plating prevents corrosion! Stainless steel is iron + chromium (>12%). Discovered in 1797. Chrome alloys incredibly hard - used for industrial drills. Chromium compounds create vibrant pigments: chrome yellow, chrome red used in paints. Hexavalent chromium (Cr-VI) is toxic carcinogen from industrial pollution. Trivalent chromium (Cr-III) may help regulate blood sugar.
